basics.name: Paul de La Celle
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: 5+ years experience in software development. More recently (2 years) into architecting/ automating and optimizing deployment over large infrastructure. Creating and improving tools for development teams to control the lifecycle of their applications

details.text: Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines, reduce development lifecycle of internal applications from weeks to less than a day
Develop an application to administrate pipelines, endpoints, repository, policies, permissions for development teams
details.comment: Domain Driven Design, C#, ASPNETCORE MVC, JavaScript

details.text: Implement Azure DevOps server tasks and extension, allow the teams to export and visualize their application metadata such as database model, authorization scheme or internal dependencies
Monitor and report usage of tools by the developers, track usage of DevOps resources by developers
Apply processes and standards for all teams
details.comment: Pull Requests, Code Review, Git Branching Models, Git Branches Policies

details.text: Deploy servers with Azure DevOps build agents (self hosted) to run the pipelines
Automate vital provisioning service to create employees, distribution lists, security groups etc. to give employees access to the internal ERP, Outlook, S4B
Redesign of provisioning application using a distributed architecture
Presentation and control backend configuration through a web application
Optimization and rewriting of database queries to allow employees provisioning

work.name: Thales
work.description: Leading manufacturer of tactical communications equipment worldwide

details.text: Backend application to broadcast messages between tactical radios with NACK to optimize data rate
Android app to demonstrate voice synthesis on the radios
Graphical interface to access radio configuration through a computer
Deployment of an automatic lighting network controlled by the ambient light and the presence of personnel

education.institution: University Institute of Technology of Cachan

interests.name: Trek
keywords: Bicycle (2 months exploration by cycle in Norway, summer 2019)
